      • queNewInstruction

        public void queNewInstruction​(VecInstruction instruction)
        Adds a new VecInstruction to the quedInstructions list
        Parameters:
        instruction - the x-coordinate to be converted as a double

      • undoInstruction

        public void undoInstruction()
        Removes a VecInstruction of the quedInstructions list if the size is greater than or equal to 1

      • revertTo

        public void revertTo​(int time)
        Given an index time greater than or equal to 0, a calculation is made which decides how many times the undoInstruction method is called.
        Parameters:
        time -

      • clearInstructions

        public void clearInstructions()
        Clears the quedInstructions list, removing all VecInstructions

      • getInstructions

        public java.util.List<VecInstruction> getInstructions()
        Returns the current quedInstructions list
        Returns:
        List

      • drawShapes

        public void drawShapes​(int upto)
        Clears the current canvas of all drawings and then loops through the quedInstructions list drawing out all of the shapes within the list

      • resetCanvas

        public void resetCanvas()
        Clears the canvas of all drawings. Re-assigns lineColor and fillColor to their default values.

      • listen

        public void listen()
        Attaches a listener to the quedInstructions list checking if a VecInstruction was add or removed. If so, then it draws out all of the shapes.
